com.affectiva.android.affdex.sdk

Class Frame

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.affectiva.android.affdex.sdk.Frame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Frame.BitmapFrame, Frame.ByteArrayFrame

    public abstract class Frame
extends Object
    A wrapper class for images, which can originate from different types (like byte[] and Bitmap).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Frame.BitmapFrame
      A class to wrap an image in a Bitmap format to a Frame readable by the SDK.
      static class  Frame.ByteArrayFrame
      A class to wrap an image in a byte array format to a Frame readable by the SDK.
      static class  Frame.COLOR_FORMAT
      Defines the Frame's color format.
      static class  Frame.ROTATE
      Defines the desired rotation before processing.

    • Method Detail

      • rotateImage

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap rotateImage(android.graphics.Bitmap src,
                                  float angleDegrees)
        Rotate a Bitmap. Utility function to use before sending images to be processed by the SDK.

        Note: if calling with large Bitmap on low-memory devices, may run out of memory.

        Parameters:
        angleDegrees - the degrees to rotate the image
        src - Bitmap to apply the rotation on
        Returns:
        Rotated image
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if src is null.

      • getOriginalBitmapFrame

        public android.graphics.Bitmap getOriginalBitmapFrame()
        Get the Bitmap that was used to create this frame, if any.
        Returns:
        Bitmap used to create this frame, null otherwise.

      • getWidth

        public abstract int getWidth()
        Get Frame's width.
        Returns:
        Frame width

      • getHeight

        public abstract int getHeight()
        Get Frame's height.
        Returns:
        Frame height

      • getPixelCount

        public int getPixelCount()
        Get total number of pixels in Frame.
        Returns:
        total pixel count

      • getColorFormat

        public Frame.COLOR_FORMAT getColorFormat()
        Get Frame's color format.
        Returns:
        color format used to create the Frame.
        See Also:
        Frame.COLOR_FORMAT

      • getTargetRotation

        public Frame.ROTATE getTargetRotation()
        Get Frame's rotation angle.
        Returns:
        rotation angle to be applied to the Frame.
        See Also:
        Frame.ROTATE

      • setTargetRotation

        public void setTargetRotation(Frame.ROTATE targetRotation)
        Set Frame's rotation angle.
        Parameters:
        targetRotation - rotation angle to be applied to the Frame.

      • revertPointRotation

        public void revertPointRotation(android.graphics.PointF[] points)
        Revert points to the Frame's original coordinate space.
        Parameters:
        points - array of points to revert in place
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if points is null.

      • revertPointRotation

        public static void revertPointRotation(android.graphics.PointF[] points,
                       int width,
                       int height,
                       Frame.ROTATE targetRot)
        Revert points to Frame's original coordinate space
        Parameters:
        points - array of points to revert in place
        width - width of original image
        height - height of original image
        targetRot - rotation used for processing the image
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - if points is null.
